SC2002 Group Project
  1. Unnamed Package

Uses of Package

  • Classes in Unnamed Package used by Unnamed Package
    Class
    Description
    Application
    Represents an internship application submitted by a student in the system.
    ApplicationManager
    Manages all application-related operations in the Internship Placement Management System.
    CareerCenterStaff
    Represents a Career Center staff member in the Internship Placement Management System.
    CLIUserBoundary
    Abstract base class for all command-line interface user boundaries in the View layer.
    CompanyRepresentative
    Represents a company representative user in the Internship Placement Management System.
    FilterCriteria
    Represents filter criteria for searching and filtering internship opportunities.
    ICriteriaFilter
    Defines the contract for criteria-based filtering of internship opportunities.
    IInternshipSorter
    Defines the contract for sorting internship opportunities.
    InternshipManager
    Manages all internship opportunities in the Internship Placement Management System.
    InternshipOpportunity
    Represents an internship opportunity posted by a company in the system.
    IStudentEligibilityFilter
    Defines the contract for student-specific eligibility filtering of internship opportunities.
    IUserBoundary
    Contract interface for all user boundary implementations in the View layer (MVC architecture).
    ReportGenerator
    Generates comprehensive reports for Career Center Staff in the Internship Placement Management System.
    Student
    Represents a student user in the Internship Placement Management System.
    SystemManager
    Central controller for the Internship Placement Management System.
    User
    Abstract base class representing a user in the Internship Placement Management System.
